description:
With this DLC you'll unlock: 
- New characters: Horse, Monkey, Zebra, and Giraffe!
- 50000 coins to buy characters and activate abilities!
- 1000 gems to buy power-ups and boss characters
- 25 freeze power-ups for stopping your opponents
- 25 rage power-ups to speed up your army

Outsmart your enemies with skill and strategy!
name: City Takeover: Gentle Animals
